caption: Detection Finding
description: A Detection Finding describes detections or alerts generated by security products using correlation engines, detection engines or other methodologies. Note: if the event producer is a security control, the security_control profile should be applied and its attacks information, if present, should be duplicated into the finding_info object.
name: detection_finding

evidences.description: Describes various evidence artifacts associated to the activity/activities that triggered a security detection.

resources.caption: Affected Resources
resources.description: Describes details about resources that were the target of the activity that triggered the finding.

vulnerabilities.description: Describes vulnerabilities reported in a Detection Finding.
